pkgmetadata.longdescription: Enrich Figures and Tables with Custom Headers and Footers and More // A simple and flexible tool designed to create enriched figures and tables by providing a way to add text around them through predefined or custom layouts. Any input which is convertible to 'grob' is supported, like 'ggplot', 'gt' or 'flextable'. Based on R 'grid' graphics, for more details see Paul Murrell (2018) doi:10.1201/9780429422768.
